meanings.definition: To edit or revise (a text) for publication or presentation.
meanings.sent1: I am reediting my essay to make it better.
meanings.sent2: She enjoys reediting her stories before sharing them.
meanings.sent3: The teacher was reediting the students' papers with a smile.
meanings.sent4: Reediting a document is like polishing a gem to make it shine.
meanings.sent5: Reediting is like giving a fresh coat of paint to a wall, making it look new again.

meanings.definition: The act of editing or revising a text for publication or presentation.
meanings.sent1: His reediting of the manuscript improved its clarity.
meanings.sent2: The reediting process can take some time to complete.
meanings.sent3: The reediting of the book turned out to be a fun task.
meanings.sent4: The reediting of the article was like sculpting a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The reediting of the report made it more professional and engaging.
